sense.def: Pathological Condition of li ji 痢疾 , ailment of free-flux illness, associated with nüe 瘧 , malaria. Jia you bu zhu Shen nong ben cao 嘉祐補註神農本草 Substance Entry bo lao 伯勞：繼病，母有娠乳兒，兒有病如瘧痢，他日相 繼腹大，或瘥或發。他人有娠，相近亦能相繼也。北人未識此病 , “Transmission disease: when a pregnant mother breast-feeds an earlier child, and this child has a disease that resembles malaria-related free-flux illness , then the next day this will be transmitted and [the mother’s] abdomen enlarged. This may recede and then break out again. If another woman is pregnant and comes close, this may also be transmitted to her. The people in the North do not know this disease”.
